name: VANguard
description: VANguard is a whole of government program that delivers cost-effective and reliable authentication services to secure business to government (B2G) and government to government (G2G) online transactions.

widgets.name: Transactions per service 2017/2018
widgets.definition: This shows the proportion of transactions per service

widgets.name: Total transactions
widgets.definition: This shows the total transactions by 6 month period since 2013.

widgets.name: Transactions by service (FY)
widgets.definition: This shows the number of transactions by service for each financial year.
